text: Marisabel Rodríguez Oropeza (born 23 November 1964) is a Venezuelan journalist, publicist and radio announcer. She is best known for having been the second wife of former Venezuelan president Hugo Chávez. From 1999 until 2004, she was the First Lady of Venezuela. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Venezuela Category:Venezuelan journalists
title: Marisabel Rodríguez de Chávez
